wikitext.*:
The '''Drúedain of Beleriand''' were those [[Drúedain]] who followed the ancestors of the [[Haladin]] from the [[White Mountains]] to the [[West]] and reached [[Beleriand]]. There they lived and fought as allies of the [[Edain]] during the late [[First Age]]. Some, like [[Aghan]], lived in the region of the [[Forest of Brethil]].<ref>{{UT|Druedain}}</ref>

Like the Edain, those who survived the [[War of Wrath]] removed to [[Elenna]].<ref>{{UT|Druedain}}, Note 7</ref>
